mapper.update: update type set name=#{type.name} where id=#{type.id}
update type t set t.blogs =t.blogs-1 where id=#{typeId} limit 1
update type t set t.blogs=t.blogs+1 where id=#{typeId} limit 1
UPDATE type t INNER JOIN ( SELECT type_id, Count(type_id) AS blogs FROM blog GROUP BY type_id ) b ON t.id = b.type_id SET t.blogs = b.blogs
mapper.select: select * from blog.type where name=#{name} limit 1
select * from type order by blogs desc
select * from type where id=#{id} limit 1
select * from type order by blogs desc limit #{typeNums}
select id from type where blogs in(select max(blogs) from type) limit 1
select name from type where id=#{typeId}
mapper.delete: delete from type where id=#{id} limit 1
